Name: AU Mic
Notes: T Tauri star, Δ*V* = 0.079m, *P* = 4.85 d; has a protoplanetary disk

Name: HD 203932
Notes: rapidly oscillating Ap star, Δ*B* < 0.0024m, *P* = 5.9 minutes

Name: BO Mic
Notes:
Speedy Mic; rotating variable, Δ*V* = 0.059m, *P* = 0.3804 d; one of the 
fastest known rotating stars

Name: AT Mic
Notes: flare star and BY Dra variable, Δ*V* = 0.029m, *P* = 0.7813 d
